Such is the way of things these days that Eric Schmidt promoted his announcement by tweeting: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! There followed a flurry of other tweets, which tech news tracker Techmeme has just started including in its results. Our favourite was from a US cnet writer that said merely:'' Eric Schmidt happens.

Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours.
